Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: nissandeh tumhaara rab jaanata hai ki tum lagabhag do tihaee raat, aadhee raat aur ek tihaee raat tak (namaaz mein) khade rahate ho, aur ek gironh un logon mein se bhee jo tumhaare saath hai, khada hota hai. aur allaah raat aur din kee ghat-badh niyat karata hai. use maaloom hai ki tum sab usaka nirvaah na kar sakoge, atah usane tumapar daya-drshti kee. ab jitana quraan aasaanee se ho sake padh liya karo. use maaloom hai ki tumame se kuchh beemaar bhee honge, aur kuchh doosare log allaah ke udaar anugrah (rozee) ko dhoondhate hue dharatee mein yaatra karenge, kuchh doosare log allaah ke maarg mein yuddh karenge. atah usamen se jitana aasaanee se ho sake padh liya karo, aur namaaz qaayam karo aur zakaat dete raho, aur allaah ko rn do, achchha rn. tum jo bhalaee bhee apane lie (aage) bhejoge use allaah ke yahaan atyuttam aur pratidaan kee drshti se bahut badhakar paoge. aur allaah se maafee maangate raho. beshak allaah atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
utho, aur saavadhaan karane mein lag jao
aur apane rab kee badaee hee karo
aur gandagee se door hee raho
apanee koshishon ko adhik samajhakar usake kram ko bhang na karo
aur apane rab ke lie dhairy hee se kaam lo
jab soor mein phoonk maaree jaegee
to jis din aisa hoga, vah din bada hee kathor hoga
inakaar karanevaalo par aasaan na hoga
chhod do mujhe aur usako jise mainne akela paida kiya
aur use maal diya door tak phaila hua
aur usake paas upasthit rahanevaale bete die
aur mainne usake lie achchhee tarah jeevan-maarg samatal kiya
phir vah lobh rakhata hai ki main usake lie aur adhik doonga
kadaapi nahin, vah hamaaree aayaton ka dushman hai
sheeghr hee main use gherakar kathin chadhaee chadhavaoonga
